Title: Monument Ave.
Actors: Denis Leary, Ian Hart, Jason Barry, Lenny Clarke
Plot: Bobby O'Grady is a low-range member of Boston Irish gang run by Jackie O'Hara. Jackie demands absolute, total loyalty from him. When Jackie kills one of Bobby's buddies, Teddy, Bobby and others have to keep it an absolute secret, even from their and Teddy's relatives.
Production: Spanky Pictures, Tribeca Productions, Apostle Pictures, Clinica Estetico, Kushner-Locke Company
